titleStmt.title: Romanæ historiæ anthologia An English exposition of the Romane antiquities, wherein many Romane and English offices are paralleld and divers obscure phrases explained. By Thomas Godwyn Master of Arts: for the vse of Abingdon Schoole.
titleStmt.author: Goodwin, Thomas, 1586 or 7-1642.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
